name: cosseqd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ccoss(c0), ccoss(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(ccoss(c0), ccoss(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ccoss(c0), ccoss(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(ccoss(c0), ccoss(c1)))

|- wi(w0, wceq(ccoss(c0), ccoss(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

comment: Equality theorem for the classes of cosets by ` A ` and ` B ` , deduction form. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 4-Nov-2019.)
